title: Implement user authentication system
description: Design and implement a secure user authentication system with JWT tokens, password hashing, and session management.

title: Fix responsive layout on mobile
description: The navigation menu is not properly collapsing on mobile devices. Need to update media queries and test across different screen sizes.

title: Code review: Payment integration
description: Review the payment gateway integration code for security vulnerabilities and best practices. Focus on error handling and data validation.

title: Database optimization
description: Optimize database queries for the user dashboard. Add proper indexing and implement query caching where appropriate.

title: Setup CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure automated testing and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions. Include code quality checks and automated testing.

title: Update API documentation
description: Update the REST API documentation with new endpoints and authentication requirements. Include example requests and responses.

title: Implement dark mode toggle
description: Add dark mode functionality to the application with persistent user preference storage and smooth theme transitions.

title: Bug: Memory leak in React components
description: Investigate and fix memory leak causing performance issues. Check for improper useEffect cleanup and event listener removal.
